--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, tansey@... wrote:
> 
> Another alternative to =
prevent overfitting would be to limit the maximum number
> of hidden nodes =
in the network. Any chance for that feature in SN2?
> 
> Wesley

So in addi=
tion to factoring genome size into the fiteness function we could put some =
hard limit on the genome size. Seems like a useful option to have. I've add=
ed it to the to-do list but how it gets achieved is undecided - I might fol=
d this into phased searching, that is, switch to simplifying mode when we h=
it the upper target. Which is how SN1 works but the target is floating. So =
potentially I just need a more flexible way of defining when to shift phase=
s.

Cheers,

Colin.
